unnormalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gathers Momentum in India**
normalised: smart meter rollout gathers momentum in India

unnormalised: New Delhi, 26/10/2023 – The ambitious smart meter deployment program across India is gaining traction, with state utilities intensifying efforts to meet the central government's target. Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL) is playing a crucial role in facilitating the process through bulk procurement and technical assistance.
normalised: new Delhi, twenty sixth october two thousand and twenty three – the ambitious smart meter deployment program across India is gaining traction, with state utilities intensifying efforts to meet the central government's target. Energy Efficiency Services Limited (E E S L) is playing a crucial role in facilitating the process through bulk procurement and technical assistance.

unnormalised: Tata Power Delhi Distribution Limited (TPDDL) has announced a significant expansion of its smart meter infrastructure in North Delhi, aiming to cover an additional 50,000 households by Q1 2024. The initiative promises improved billing accuracy, reduced power theft, and enhanced grid management. Consumers can monitor their energy consumption in near real-time via a dedicated mobile app, potentially leading to significant savings on their monthly electricity bills. The estimated investment for this phase is Rs. 75 Crores.
normalised: Tata Power Delhi Distribution Limited (T P D D L) has announced a significant expansion of its smart meter infrastructure in North Delhi, aiming to cover an additional fifty thousand households by Q one two thousand and twenty four. The initiative promises improved billing accuracy, reduced power theft, and enhanced grid management. Consumers can monitor their energy consumption in near real-time via a dedicated mobile app, potentially leading to significant savings on their monthly electricity bills. The estimated investment for this phase is rupee seventy five crores.

unnormalised: "This deployment aligns with the vision of a technologically advanced and sustainable energy sector," stated a senior official from the Ministry of Power at a conference held on 15/08/2023. The program is expected to contribute substantially to India's commitment to reduce carbon emissions by 2030. Trials are underway in various cities, including Jaipur, with data being analyzed every day at 17:00 hrs to optimize network performance. A national webinar on the topic is scheduled for 30/11/2023 at 10:00 hrs.
normalised: "This deployment aligns with the vision of a technologically advanced and sustainable energy sector," stated a senior official from the Ministry of Power at a conference held on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three. The program is expected to contribute substantially to India's commitment to reduce carbon emissions by two thousand and thirty. Trials are underway in various cities, including Jaipur, with data being analyzed every day at seventeen hundred hours to optimize network performance. A national webinar on the topic is scheduled for thirtieth november two thousand and twenty three at ten hundred hours.
